      Function to move any MovingAgent; This function move the MovingAgent to one cell and if can't be there is reset the position to the previously position

      Function to move all MovingAgents of the game; First move Hero and second move all other MovingAgents;

      Function to move all MovingAgents off game except Hero;

      Function to move Weapon of any MovingAgent;

      Function to handle the Ogre; Verify if the Ogre is stunned, and if is true just move the weapon of it;
      private void ogreStunned(MovingAgent actualAgent)
      Function to set Ogre stunned if is the case of it; Just stun the Ogre if distance between weapon of Hero and Ogre is under of 1;
      void resetLevel()
      Function to reset completely the game; This first prepare the configuration to this level; After will get the information of the start conditions of the game on config and set all to the game;
      private int responseHandler(MovingAgent actualAgent, int isFreeResponse, java.awt.Point lastPosition)
      Function that handle with the response of GameMap.isFree() after move one MovingAgent; If return of GameMap.isFree() is: .. 0 - Out of Map, the position of MovingAgent is reset to the previously; .. 1 - Free Space, verify if took the key or enables the lever and if stun the Ogre; .. 2 - Stairs, verify if the MovingAgent is Hero to with the game; .. 3 - Door, verify if the MovingAgent have the key to Open the door;
      void setConfig(Configs config)
      Function to set the configuration object to the Game;

        Constructor of Game; Initialize Game and set configuration;

    • Method Detail

      • resetLevel

        public void resetLevel()
        Function to reset completely the game; This first prepare the configuration to this level; After will get the information of the start conditions of the game on config and set all to the game;

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Function to get current level;
        Returns:
        int - correspond to the current level being playing (0 - Test Level; 1 - Dungeon Level; 2 - Keep Level);

      • getArrayMap

        private char[][] getArrayMap()
        Function to get game board from GameMap;
        Returns:
        char[][] - that correspond to the current map being playing.

      • getMap

        public char[][] getMap()
        Function to get the map with all objects one board; The MovingAgents also are one the array of char;
        Returns:
        char[][] - with all object one game;

      • getHero

        public Hero getHero()
        Function to get the Hero one the Game;
        Returns:
        Hero - correspond to the Hero of game, if game don't have Hero return null;

      • getFirstOgre

        public Ogre getFirstOgre()
        Function to get first Ogre
        Returns:
        Ogre - correspond to the first Ogre of the Game, if game don't have one Ogre return null;

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Function that verify if game is over and update the gameStatus; Game is over if the distance between Guards or weapon of Ogres is under 1;
        Returns:
        boolean - True if game is over, False if game is steel playing;

      • setConfig

        public void setConfig(Configs config)
        Function to set the configuration object to the Game;
        Parameters:
        config - - Configs to be set on Game;

      • moveAllAgents

        public int moveAllAgents(char heroNextDirection)
        Function to move all MovingAgents of the game; First move Hero and second move all other MovingAgents;
        Parameters:
        heroNextDirection - - char that correspond the next direction of hero;
        Returns:
        0 - next round; 1 - for next level; 2 - for victory; 3 - for defeat;

      • moveHero

        public int moveHero(char direction)
        Function to move just the Hero;
        Parameters:
        direction - - char that correspond the next direction of hero;
        Returns:
        0 - move of hero occur with success; 1 - for next level; 2 - for victory;

      • moveBots

        public void moveBots()
        Function to move all MovingAgents off game except Hero;

      • moveAgent

        public int moveAgent(MovingAgent actualAgent,
                     char direction)
        Function to move any MovingAgent; This function move the MovingAgent to one cell and if can't be there is reset the position to the previously position
        Parameters:
        actualAgent - MovingAgent - that correspond the agent to move;
        direction - char - thar correpond to the direction of move;
        Returns:
        0 - Nothing; 1 - ChangeToNextMap; 2 - Victory;

      • moveWeapon

        private void moveWeapon(MovingAgent actualAgent)
        Function to move Weapon of any MovingAgent;
        Parameters:
        actualAgent - - MovingAgent that needs to move your's weapon

      • ogreHandler

        private int ogreHandler(MovingAgent actualAgent)
        Function to handle the Ogre; Verify if the Ogre is stunned, and if is true just move the weapon of it;
        Parameters:
        actualAgent - - Ogre to handle;
        Returns:
        0 - Ogre can move; 1 - Ogre canÂ´t move;

      • responseHandler

        private int responseHandler(MovingAgent actualAgent,
                            int isFreeResponse,
                            java.awt.Point lastPosition)
        Function that handle with the response of GameMap.isFree() after move one MovingAgent; If return of GameMap.isFree() is: .. 0 - Out of Map, the position of MovingAgent is reset to the previously; .. 1 - Free Space, verify if took the key or enables the lever and if stun the Ogre; .. 2 - Stairs, verify if the MovingAgent is Hero to with the game; .. 3 - Door, verify if the MovingAgent have the key to Open the door;
        Parameters:
        actualAgent - MovingAgent - that correspond to the agent is on move;
        isFreeResponse - int - that correspond to the response of GameMap.isFree()[0-Out of map; 1 - ' '; 2 - 'S'; 3 - 'I']
        lastPosition - Point - that contains the position before move the agent;
        Returns:
        0 - move with success; 1 - next level; 2 - victory;

      • leverHandler

        private void leverHandler(MovingAgent actualAgent)
        Function that verify if MovingAgent enables the lever;
        Parameters:
        actualAgent - - MovingAgent that needs to verify if enables the lever;

      • keyHandler

        private void keyHandler(MovingAgent actualAgent)
        Function that verify if MovingAgent took the key;
        Parameters:
        actualAgent - - MovingAgent that needs to verify if took the key;

      • ogreStunned

        private void ogreStunned(MovingAgent actualAgent)
        Function to set Ogre stunned if is the case of it; Just stun the Ogre if distance between weapon of Hero and Ogre is under of 1;
        Parameters:
        actualAgent - - MovingAgent that correspond to the Ogre to be set stun;

      • changeDoorsToStairs

        private void changeDoorsToStairs(java.awt.Point[] doors)
        Function that change doors to stairs; This call the function of GameMap to do it;
        Parameters:
        doors - - Point[] all doors to change to stairs;
